Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Atlantic Ocean: 2 , Baffin Bay: 4 , Greenland Sea: 1 , Labrador Sea: 2 , Pacific Ocean: 1 ;
total: 10 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 21 : 6 , FAO 27 : 3 , FAO 77 : 1 ;
total: 10 .

Remarks: This species is known only from high latitude, cold water sites in the northern hemisphere, the exception being a recent report for California, which needs confirmation.
Echiniscoides hoepneri
is a parasite of barnacles (
Balanus balanoides
) (
Kristensen & Hallas 1980
).
